ToDo App is simple and awesome app to organize your tasks with very easy to use interface. ToDo can help you to make list of your tasks to be reviwed at any time. We believe that we only focus on our Today and Tomorrow tasks, which is most important. So we made user interface like that so that it can give you a quick view on your day timeline.

Functions : - Add your task as a list. - Add unlimited Categories to organize your work - Modify your Task Heading / Descriptions - Share it with other friends / Family. - Check your Done tasks and you can restore them back or delete permanently.

ToDo App is built using - React, Javascript - HTML, CSS, Bootstrap

Now you have Web and phone-based expense tracker apps that can help you reach a whole new level of financial knowledge and preparedness. Super hero themes react-redux application built with complete add/remove functionality. When we were child, we used to play card games of certain characters like pokemon cards, wresters cards. this is a small project wherein we can make our team of superheroes along with their powers, strength and can make a small game for leisure time, same as our card game.

Functions : - Add your superheroes into your list. - Make a team of superheroes you like. - You can also add the heroes and see the total and individual strengths. - Share it with other friends / Family. - Check your added heroes and you can restore them back or remove them.

SquadManagement App is built using - React, Redux, Javascript - HTML, CSS, Bootstrap
